title: file_internally_registered
description: This event type is triggered when a new file is registered to the Internal File Registry service and is available in the Permanent Storage.

request_id.description: A unique identified for the original user request that let to this event.

file_id.description: The public ID of the file (as generated by the Metadata Repository service)

timestamp.description: The time when the file was made available in the Permanent Storage.
